QuestData.Title: Step Three: Prophet!
QuestData.Description: You have arrived in Shadowmoon Valley. It is time to speak with the prophet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Prophet Velen near the crashed Iron Horde Ship in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: <The prophet welcomes you with a curious look, then a warm nod.>$b$bSo it begins.
